Extract V-Dem and V-Party data

Source: R/extract_vdem.R
extract_vdem.Rd

Functions to import the V-Dem and the V-Party datasets from their {vdemdata} package in a qVerse consistent format.

import_vdem()

import_vparty()

Value

A dataframe of the[vdem] dataset in a qVerse-consistent format.

A dataframe of the[vparty] dataset in a qVerse-consistent format.

Details

import_vdem() imports VDem 11.1 dataset and formats them to a qVerse consistent output.

import_vparty() imports the V-Party dataset and formats it to a qVerse consistent dataframe.

Examples

# \donttest{
import_vdem()

#> # A tibble: 27,192 × 4,172
#>       ID Abbrv Label     Country Beg    End    Year  Date  codingstart codingend
#>    <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <chr>   <mess> <mess> <mes> <mes>       <dbl>     <dbl>
